Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Hofton Avenue, between north of the Evenborough Inn.
Room.LongDescription: Travelers coming in from the north side of the town often stop at the Evenborough Inn before heading into town, assuring them of a good place to stay the night. It is a very long walk to the southern side of town, where the rest of the Inns are located, although there are a couple near the marina. The Evenborough Inn is also ideal for visitors to Lyanden Castle, which lies to the east of the Inn.
